member.name: T:周易.别卦
member.summary: Represents a hexagram.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.易经序号
member.summary: Get the position of the hexagram in I Ching. The value ranges from 1 to 64.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.卦画
member.summary: Get the painting of the hexagram.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.卦名
member.summary: Get the name of the hexagram.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.卦辞
member.summary: Get the the meaning of the hexagram.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.用辞
member.summary: Get the the words after the word "yong" which only exists in Ch'ien (Heaven) and K'un (Earth). It will returns null if the hexagram isn't Ch'ien or K'un.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.各爻
member.summary: Get the lines of this hexagram. It will starts from the bottom one.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.客卦
member.summary: Get the upper trigram.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.上爻
member.summary: Get the top (sixth) line.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.五爻
member.summary: Get the fifth line.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.四爻
member.summary: Get the fourth line.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.主卦
member.summary: Get the lower trigram.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.三爻
member.summary: Get the third line.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.二爻
member.summary: Get the second line.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.初爻
member.summary: Get the bottom (first) line.

member.name: M:周易.别卦.ToString
member.summary: Returns the text similar to the text of the current in I Ching.

member.name: P:周易.别卦.全部别卦卦名
member.summary: Get the names of all hexagrams. This is arranged according to I Ching (I don't want to list it, buy the book and you will know it).

member.name: M:周易.别卦.获取别卦(System.String)
member.summary: Get a hexagram from its name.
member.param: The name. The value shouldn't end with '卦'.

member.name: M:周易.别卦.获取别卦(周易.经卦,周易.经卦)
member.summary: Get a hexagram from its two trigrams.
member.exception: At least one argument is null.

member.name: M:周易.别卦.获取别卦(周易.卦画)
member.summary: Get a hexagram from its painting.
member.param: The painting. Its property should be 6.

member.name: T:周易.卦画
member.summary: Represents a painting made up by the yin and yang lines. While generally it can stand for a hexagram or a trigram, you can also use , and to make your own painting but a painting including more than 7 lines is not allowed. When you use this class as or , you will get the lower lines first.

member.name: P:周易.卦画.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the attribute (yin or yang) of a line in the painting.
member.param: The index of the line you want to get. The higher the value is, the upper the line you will get. The minimum value is 0.

member.name: M:周易.卦画.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection. When you use this enumerator, you will get the lower lines first.
member.returns: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.

member.name: P:周易.卦画.爻数
member.summary: The count of the lines in the painting.

member.name: M:周易.卦画.#ctor(周易.阴阳[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: M:周易.卦画.ToByte
member.summary: Convert to a . You can convert it back by using .
member.returns: The byte that can represent this painting.

member.name: M:周易.卦画.FromByte(System.Byte)
member.summary: Convert from a .
member.param: The byte that represents this painting.

member.name: M:周易.卦画.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the painting. You can use to convert it back.

member.name: M:周易.卦画.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Convert from a .
member.param: The string represents the painting. Its property should be less than 8 and only digits are allowed.
member.exception: is not in the correct format.

member.name: M:周易.卦画.CompareTo(周易.卦画)
member.summary: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared.

member.name: M:周易.卦画.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance, or null.
member.returns: true if obj is an instance of System.Byte and equals the value of this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:周易.卦画.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.
member.returns: A hash code for the current .

member.name: M:周易.卦画.Equals(周易.卦画)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether this instance and a specified object represent the same value.
member.param: An object to compare to this instance.
member.returns: true if obj is equal to this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:周易.卦画.op_Equality(周易.卦画,周易.卦画)
M:周易.卦画.op_Inequality(周易.卦画,周易.卦画)
T:周易.爻
member.summary: Represents a line in a hexagram.

member.name: P:周易.爻.爻辞
member.summary: The meaning of the line.

member.name: P:周易.爻.爻题
member.summary: The title of the line.

member.name: T:周易.爻题
member.summary: Represents the title of a line.

member.name: P:周易.爻题.Index
member.summary: The index of the line. This value is equal to ( - 1).

member.name: P:周易.爻题.爻位置
member.summary: The position of the line.

member.name: P:周易.爻题.爻阴阳
member.summary: The attribute (yin or yang) of the line.

member.name: M:周易.爻题.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the title.
member.returns: A string that represents the title.

member.name: T:周易.经卦
member.summary: Represents a trigram.

member.name: P:周易.经卦.卦名
member.summary: Get the trigram's name.

member.name: P:周易.经卦.自然属性
member.summary: Get the nature attribute the trigram represents.

member.name: P:周易.经卦.卦画
member.summary: Get the painting of the trigram.

member.name: P:周易.经卦.上爻阴阳
member.summary: Get the attribute (yin or yang) of the top (third) line.

member.name: P:周易.经卦.中爻阴阳
member.summary: Get the attribute (yin or yang) of the middle (second) line.

member.name: P:周易.经卦.初爻阴阳
member.summary: Get the attribute (yin or yang) of the bottom (first) line.

member.name: P:周易.经卦.全部经卦卦名
M:周易.经卦.获取经卦(System.Char)
member.summary: Get a trigram from its name.

member.summary: Get a trigram from its painting.
member.param: The painting. Its property should be 3.

member.name: T:周易.阴阳
member.summary: Represents the attribute (yin or yang) of a line.

member.name: F:周易.阴阳.阴
member.summary: Represents yin.

member.name: F:周易.阴阳.阳
member.summary: Represents yang.
